messages.title: Your Messages
messages.summary: Your Facebook data contains {{messages}} messages from {{threads}} chats with {{people}} people.
report.success: Your report was sent to us. Thank you!
report.error: Report could not be sent. Try again!
reportCard.headline: We need your help!
reportCard.text: If you send us an anonymised report about the structure of your Facebook data, it would help us improve the Facebook Data Importer so that it can show you even more insights.
details.noAnalyses: Unfortunately, we were unable to present any insights based on the data you imported. If you think this is a bug, please get in touch and help us out.
